actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

committees.subcommittee: Higher Education and Workforce Development Subcomittee

official_title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to restrict the disqualification of students for drug offenses to those students who committed offenses while receiving student financial aid.
short_title: Responsible Student Financial Assistance Assurance Act of 2003

summary.text: Responsible Student Financial Assistance Assurance Act of 2003 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide that only those students who have committed drug offenses during the period they were receiving student grant, loan, or work assistance shall have their eligibility for such assistance suspended upon conviction for such an offense.

titles.title: Responsible Student Financial Assistance Assurance Act of 2003
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to restrict the disqualification of students for drug offenses to those students who committed offenses while receiving student financial aid.
Responsible Student Financial Assistance Assurance Act of 2003
